The wiki defaults to the British convention for floor numbering: Ground floor, first floor, etc. This may be changed by clicking the moon icon at the top right of the site.
This article is about non-event NPC. For 2021 Halloween event NPC, see Brother Jered (2021 Halloween event).
Brother Jered
Released12 July 2001 (Update)
MembersNo

Map
Advanced data
NPC ID2578

Brother Jered is a monk at the Edgeville Monastery. Players may speak to him to have their holy symbols blessed one at a time. Since he is on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US], only those with a Prayer level of 31 can access him. Players who achieve level 99 Prayer may purchase the Prayer cape from him for 99,000 coins.

Brother Jered is unable to assist the player in the 2021 Halloween event on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US], exclaiming to come see him downstairs for his paperwork (where his 2021 Halloween event NPC is also located).

Stock[edit | edit source]

Note: If a player has multiple 99s, they will receive the trimmed variant of the cape instead.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • He believes that the Prayer cape is the hardest to acquire because it requires great devotion to the gods.
  • With the exception of his Prayer cape, he looks identical to Brother Brace.
